creator: iMe Group
descriptionHtml:
Fast, Smart, Powerful, Private, Cloud-based, Secure.

iMe Messenger is an unofficial Telegram API based client.

User authorization, data transferring and storing are conducted through official client’s servers.
Privacy and security are fully guaranteed by the official client.

iMe Messenger uses messengers’ environment for further functions developing and neurobots (chat assistants) training.

Users install iMe Messenger to use new features and all advantages of Artificial Intelligence (Ai) without losing their social circle and the usual quality of the advanced messenger.

iMe Messenger helps users sort chats by folders with additional settings (Tabs from the bottom; Disable the All chats tab; Change the FAB buttons for each folder, etc.).

Convenient Collections give users the ability to quickly find and subscribe to channels, groups and bots of interest on various topics.

Neurobots inside chats save time and make communication more interesting.

Additional features:

- Chats grouping in folders;
- Cloud with sorting messages by type;
- Translator of incoming and outgoing messages inside chats;
- Forwarding a message without quoting;
- Multi-panel in chats, for quick access to in-depth buttons;
- Neurobots-assistants providing users with phrases and gifs as responses;
- Neurobots market with different categories of assistants;
- Channel/Group/Bot Collections;
- Wallet and internal coins, as a universal means of payment and monetization in the application;

Character neurobots offer you ready phrases and gifs in their styles and manners so you can answer a message in a chat. If the incoming message isn’t suitable for a certain neurobot, it simply won’t offer you its variant of a response.

The more different neurobots you add to your chats, the more unique responses to the greater number of messages they will be able to offer. A neurobot reacts to the last incoming message, and if this message corresponds to its subject, the neurobot is activated.

You can also use the Reply function for a previous incoming message in order to apply your neurobot to the phrase.

Write to our support service if you have any requests, questions or complaints:
support@imem.app

For cooperation:
info@imem.app

Write in the messenger:
https://t.me/iMeMessenger
descriptionShort: iMe messenger is an unofficial Telegram API based client.

title: iMe Messenger & Wallet

container.value: Boumpoulinas 1-3, Bouboulina Building, Flat/Office 42, Nicosia, 1060, Cyprus

creator: iMe Lab
descriptionHtml:
Fast, Smart, Powerful, Private, Cloud-based, Secure.

User authorization, data transferring and storing are conducted through official client’s servers.
Privacy and security are fully guaranteed by the official client.

iMe Messenger uses messengers’ environment for further functions developing and neurobots (chat assistants) training.

Users install iMe Messenger to use new features and all advantages of Artificial Intelligence (Ai) without losing their social circle and the usual quality of the advanced messenger.

iMe Messenger helps users sort chats by folders with additional settings (Tabs from the bottom; Disable the All chats tab; Change the FAB buttons for each folder, etc.).

Convenient Collections give users the ability to quickly find and subscribe to channels, groups and bots of interest on various topics.

Neurobots inside chats save time and make communication more interesting.

Additional features:

- Sort chats by type;
- Chats grouping in folders;
- Cloud with sorting messages by type;
- Translator of incoming and outgoing messages inside chats;
- Forwarding a message without quoting;
- Multi-panel in chats, for quick access to in-depth buttons;
- Text from a Photo;
- Transcribes voice messages to text;
- Emoji with sound;
- Stickers + your own text;
- Neurobots-assistants providing users with phrases and gifs as responses;
- Neurobots market with different categories of assistants;
- Catalog of Channels, Groups and Bots;
- Wallet and internal coins, as a universal means of payment and monetization in the application;

All the advantages of iMe - https://t.me/ime_en/23

Character neurobots offer you ready phrases and gifs in their styles and manners so you can answer a message in a chat. If the incoming message isn’t suitable for a certain neurobot, it simply won’t offer you its variant of a response.

The more different neurobots you add to your chats, the more unique responses to the greater number of messages they will be able to offer. A neurobot reacts to the last incoming message, and if this message corresponds to its subject, the neurobot is activated.

You can also use the Reply function for a previous incoming message in order to apply your neurobot to the phrase.

Write to our support service if you have any requests, questions or complaints.

title: iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet

container.value: Boumpoulinas 1-3, Bouboulina Building, Flat/Office 42, Nicosia, 1060, Cyprus

creator: iMe Lab
descriptionHtml:
Multifunctional, Fast, Powerful, Private, Cloud-based, Secure.

The official client team performs the main development of the messenger creating the most progressive and technological platform in the world.

The iMe team improves the functionality of the official client as well as develops its own features:

TO WORK WITH CHATS
• Topics and chat folders;
• Advanced settings for tabs and folders;
• Sorting chats by types;
• Sorting chats in archive;
• Private albums in the Cloud;
• Music from your device and chats is in a single section;

ADVANCED INTERFACE
• Multi-panel in chats;
• Side menu settings;
• Wide posts and disabling the bottom bar in the channels;
• Contacts filters;

CONVENIENT TOOLS
• Multi-forwarding to chats with on/off author;
• Multi-reply in groups;
• Translation of incoming and outgoing messages;
• Extracting text from the image;
• Making description of the image;
• Converting voice messages into text;
• Adding reactions with emoji and buttons with links to messages;
• Animated sticker and GIF on your video avatar;
• Neurobots-assistants offering quick replies in the form of phrases and GIFs;
• Clearing cache once a day;
• iMe settings backup in the Cloud;

FINANCE
• Crypto Wallet for Ethereum accounts (ETH, USDT, LIME, OLCF) for cryptocurrency storage, purchasing and transferring crypto within chats;
• Internal coins AiCoin as a universal means of calculation and in-app monetization;

Many other features are available in iMe, join us and try all of it!

User authorization, data transfer and storage occur through Telegram servers. Privacy and security are fully provided by the official client.

Write to our support team if you have any wishes, questions and complaints.

descriptionHtml:
iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet is a multifunctional client powered by Telegram API with integrated Tools, Ai, Blockchain and Crypto Wallet.

TO WORK WITH CHATS

CONVENIENT TOOLS

title: iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet

container.value: Boumpoulinas 1-3, Bouboulina Building, Flat/Office 42, Nicosia, 1060, Cyprus

creator: iMe Lab
descriptionHtml:
iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet is a multifunctional client, powered by API Telegram with built-in tools, Artificial Intelligence, Crypto Wallet and Blockchain.

Multifunctional, Fast, Confidential, Cloudy, Secure, Financial.

The main development of the messenger is performed by the official client team, creating the most progressive and advanced messenger in the world.

The iMe team improves the functionality of the main client and also develops its own features:

TO WORK WITH CHATS
• Connection of up to 5 accounts;
• Topics and folders for grouping chats;
• Advanced settings for tabs and folders;
• FAB-buttons settings for changing the standard Pencil;
• Automatic chat sorting by type, including the archive;
• Private albums in the Cloud;
• Music from your chats and device in a single section;
• Improved chats preview by long tap.

ADVANCED INTERFACE
• Multipanel in chats;
• Messages sorting in chats and in the Cloud;
• Side menu customization;
• Customization of context menu of messages;
• Wide posts and hiding the bottom panel in channels;
• Collapsible posts;
• Filters for contacts and group members;
• Camera selection before recording video messages;
• Confirmation of calls, sending GIF and stickers.

CONVENIENT TOOLS
• Multi-forwarding messages with options, including without author, as well as cross accounts;
• Multi-responses in groups;
• Translation of incoming and outgoing messages;
• Taking out text from photos and images descriptions;
• Translation of voice messages up to 1 minute into text;
• Adding reactions and buttons with links to messages;
• Installing an animated sticker or GIF on your video avatar;
• Neurobot assistants offering quick answers in the form of phrases and GIFs;
• Deleting service messages in your groups and channels;
• Shifting to the beginning of the chat;
• Clearing the cache once a day, separately in chats and in the archive;
• iMe settings backup to the Cloud.

FINANCE
• Crypto wallet for Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain accounts for storing, purchasing and transferring cryptocurrencies;
• Large selection of cryptocurrencies and tokens (ETH, USDT, LIME, BNB, BUSD, LINK, WBTC, MATIC, OKB, LIT, etc);
• Transfers to public addresses, by QR-code, by user ID and directly inside chats;
• Switching between ERC20 / BEP20 networks and exchange bridge;
• DeFi and staking programs;
• Simplex integration for safe purchases of cryptocurrencies via bank cards;
• Decentralized exchange via Uniswap and Pancakeswap.

There are many other features in iMe, join us and try it all!

User authorization, transmission and storage of data occurs through servers of the official client.
Confidentiality and security are fully ensured by the official client.

Write to our support team if you have any wishes, questions or complaints.

title: iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet

creator: iMe Lab
descriptionHtml:
iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet is a multifunctional client, powered by API Telegram with built-in tools, Artificial Intelligence, Crypto Wallet and Blockchain.

Multifunctional, Fast, Confidential, Cloudy, Secure, Financial.

The main development of the messenger is performed by the official client team, creating the most progressive and advanced messenger in the world.

The iMe team improves the functionality of the main client and also develops its own features:

TO WORK WITH CHATS
• Connection of up to 5 accounts;
• Topics and folders for grouping chats;
• Advanced settings for tabs and folders;
• FAB-buttons settings for changing the standard Pencil;
• Automatic chat sorting by type, including the archive;
• Private albums in the Cloud;
• Music from your chats and device in a single section;
• Improved chats preview by long tap.

ADVANCED INTERFACE
• Multipanel in chats;
• Messages sorting in chats and in the Cloud;
• Side menu customization;
• Customization of context menu of messages;
• Wide posts and hiding the bottom panel in channels;
• Collapsible posts;
• Filters for contacts and group members;
• Camera selection before recording video messages;
• Confirmation of calls, sending GIF and stickers.

CONVENIENT TOOLS
• Multi-forwarding messages with options, including without author, as well as cross accounts;
• Multi-responses in groups;
• Translation of incoming and outgoing messages;
• Taking out text from photos and images descriptions;

• Adding reactions and buttons with links to messages;
• Installing an animated sticker or GIF on your video avatar;
• Neurobot assistants offering quick answers in the form of phrases and GIFs;
• Deleting service messages in your groups and channels;

FINANCE

• Large selection of cryptocurrencies and tokens (ETH, USDT, LIME, BNB, BUSD, LINK, WBTC, MATIC, OKB, LIT, etc);

title: iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet

container.value: Boumpoulinas 1-3, Bouboulina Building, Flat/Office 42, Nicosia, 1060, Cyprus

creator: iMe Lab
descriptionHtml:
iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet is a multifunctional client, powered by API Telegram with built-in tools, Artificial Intelligence, Crypto Wallet and Blockchain.

Multifunctional, Fast, Confidential, Cloudy, Secure, Financial.

The main development of the messenger is performed by the official client team, creating the most progressive and advanced messenger in the world.

The iMe team improves the functionality of the main client and also develops its own features:

TO WORK WITH CHATS
• Connection of up to 5 accounts;
• Topics and folders for grouping chats;
• Advanced settings for tabs and folders;
• FAB-buttons settings for changing the standard Pencil;
• Automatic chat sorting by type, including the archive;
• Private albums in the Cloud;
• Music from your chats and device in a single section;
• Improved chats preview by long tap.

ADVANCED INTERFACE
• Multipanel in chats;
• Messages sorting in chats and in the Cloud;
• Side menu customization;
• Customization of context menu of messages;
• Wide posts and hiding the bottom panel in channels;
• Collapsible posts;
• Filters for contacts and group members;
• Camera selection before recording video messages;
• Confirmation of calls, sending GIF and stickers.

CONVENIENT TOOLS
• Multi-forwarding messages with options, including without author, as well as cross accounts;
• Multi-responses in groups;
• Translation of incoming and outgoing messages;
• Taking out text from photos and images descriptions;
• Translation of voice messages up to 1 minute into text;
• Adding reactions and buttons with links to messages;
• Installing an animated sticker or GIF on your video avatar;
• Neurobot assistants offering quick answers in the form of phrases and GIFs;
• Deleting service messages in your groups and channels;
• Shifting to the beginning of the chat;
• Clearing the cache once a day, separately in chats and in the archive;
• iMe settings backup to the Cloud.

FINANCE
• Crypto wallet for Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain accounts for storing, purchasing and transferring cryptocurrencies;
• Large selection of cryptocurrencies and tokens (ETH, USDT, LIME, BNB, BUSD, LINK, WBTC, MATIC, OKB, LIT, etc);
• Transfers to public addresses, by QR-code, by user ID and directly inside chats;
• Switching between ERC20 / BEP20 networks and exchange bridge;
• DeFi and staking programs;
• Simplex integration for safe purchases of cryptocurrencies via bank cards;
• Decentralized exchange via Uniswap and Pancakeswap.

There are many other features in iMe, join us and try it all!

User authorization, transmission and storage of data occurs through servers of the official client.
Confidentiality and security are fully ensured by the official client.

Write to our support team if you have any wishes, questions or complaints.

creator: iMe Lab
descriptionHtml:
iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet is a multifunctional client, powered by API Telegram with built-in tools, Artificial Intelligence, Crypto Wallet and Blockchain.

Multifunctional, Fast, Confidential, Cloudy, Secure, Financial.

The main development of the messenger is performed by the official client team, creating the most progressive and advanced messenger in the world.

The iMe team improves the functionality of the main client and also develops its own features:

TO WORK WITH CHATS
• Connection of up to 5 accounts;
• Topics and folders for grouping chats;
• Advanced settings for tabs and folders;
• FAB-buttons settings for changing the standard Pencil;
• Automatic chat sorting by type, including the archive;
• Private albums in the Cloud;
• Music from your chats and device in a single section;
• Improved chats preview by long tap.

ADVANCED INTERFACE
• Multipanel in chats;
• Messages sorting in chats and in the Cloud;
• Side menu customization;
• Customization of context menu of messages;
• Wide posts and hiding the bottom panel in channels;
• Collapsible posts;
• Filters for contacts and group members;
• Camera selection before recording video messages;

CONVENIENT TOOLS
• Multi-forwarding messages with options, including without author, as well as cross accounts;

• Translation of incoming and outgoing messages;

descriptionHtml:
iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet is a multifunctional client, powered by API Telegram with built-in tools, Artificial Intelligence, Crypto Wallet and Blockchain.

The main development of the messenger is performed by the official client team, creating the most progressive and advanced messenger in the world.

The iMe team improves the functionality of the main client and also develops its own features:

TO WORK WITH CHATS
• Connection of up to 5 accounts;
• Topics and folders for grouping chats;
• Advanced settings for tabs and folders;
• FAB-buttons settings for changing the standard Pencil;
• Automatic chat sorting by type, including the archive;
• Private albums in the Cloud;
• Music from your chats and device in a single section;
• Improved chats preview by long tap.

ADVANCED INTERFACE
• Multipanel in chats;
• Messages sorting in chats and in the Cloud;
• Side menu customization;
• Customization of context menu of messages;
• Wide posts and hiding the bottom panel in channels;
• Collapsible posts;
• Filters for contacts and group members;
• Camera selection before recording video messages;
• Confirmation of calls, sending GIF and stickers.

CONVENIENT TOOLS
• Multi-forwarding messages with options, including without author, as well as cross accounts;
• Multi-responses in groups;
• Translation of incoming and outgoing messages;
• Taking out text from photos and images descriptions;
• Translation of voice messages up to 1 minute into text;
• Adding reactions and buttons with links to messages;
• Installing an animated sticker or GIF on your video avatar;
• Neurobot assistants offering quick answers in the form of phrases and GIFs;
• Deleting service messages in your groups and channels;
• Shifting to the beginning of the chat;
• Clearing the cache once a day, separately in chats and in the archive;
• iMe settings backup to the Cloud.

FINANCE
• Crypto wallet for Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain accounts for storing, purchasing and transferring cryptocurrencies;
• Large selection of cryptocurrencies and tokens (ETH, USDT, LIME, BNB, BUSD, LINK, WBTC, MATIC, OKB, LIT, etc);
• Transfers to public addresses, by QR-code, by user ID and directly inside chats;
• Switching between ERC20 / BEP20 networks and exchange bridge;
• DeFi and staking programs;
• Simplex integration for safe purchases of cryptocurrencies via bank cards;
• Decentralized exchange via Uniswap and Pancakeswap.

container.value: Boumpoulinas 1-3, Bouboulina Building, Flat/Office 42, Nicosia, 1060, Cyprus

creator: iMe Lab
descriptionHtml:
iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet is a multifunctional client, powered by API Telegram with built-in tools, Artificial Intelligence, Crypto Wallet and Blockchain.

The main development of the messenger is performed by the official client team, creating the most progressive and advanced messenger in the world.

The iMe team improves the functionality of the main client and also develops its own features:

TO WORK WITH CHATS
• Connection of up to 5 accounts;
• Topics and folders for grouping chats;
• Advanced settings for tabs and folders;
• FAB-buttons settings for changing the standard Pencil;
• Automatic chat sorting by type, including the archive;
• Private albums in the Cloud;
• Music from your chats and device in a single section;
• Improved chats preview by long tap.

ADVANCED INTERFACE
• Multipanel in chats;
• Messages sorting in chats and in the Cloud;
• Side menu customization;
• Customization of context menu of messages;
• Wide posts and hiding the bottom panel in channels;
• Collapsible posts;
• Filters for contacts and group members;
• Camera selection before recording video messages;
• Confirmation of calls, sending GIF and stickers.

CONVENIENT TOOLS
• Multi-forwarding messages with options, including without author, as well as cross accounts;
• Multi-responses in groups;
• Translation of incoming and outgoing messages;
• Taking out text from photos and images descriptions;
• Translation of voice messages up to 1 minute into text;
• Adding reactions and buttons with links to messages;
• Installing an animated sticker or GIF on your video avatar;
• Neurobot assistants offering quick answers in the form of phrases and GIFs;
• Deleting service messages in your groups and channels;
• Shifting to the beginning of the chat;
• Clearing the cache once a day, separately in chats and in the archive;
• iMe settings backup to the Cloud.

FINANCE
• Crypto wallet for Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain accounts for storing, purchasing and transferring cryptocurrencies;
• Large selection of cryptocurrencies and tokens (ETH, USDT, LIME, BNB, BUSD, LINK, WBTC, MATIC, OKB, LIT, etc);
• Transfers to public addresses, by QR-code, by user ID and directly inside chats;
• Switching between ERC20 / BEP20 networks and exchange bridge;
• DeFi and staking programs;
• Simplex integration for safe purchases of cryptocurrencies via bank cards;
• Decentralized exchange via Uniswap and Pancakeswap.

There are many other features in iMe, join us and try it all!

User authorization, transmission and storage of data occurs through servers of the official client.
Confidentiality and security are fully ensured by the official client.

Write to our support team if you have any wishes, questions or complaints.

The iMe team improves the functionality of the main client and also develops its own features:

TO WORK WITH CHATS
• Connection of up to 5 accounts;
• Topics and folders for grouping chats;
• Advanced settings for tabs and folders;
• FAB-buttons settings for changing the standard Pencil;
• Automatic chat sorting by type, including the archive;
• Private albums in the Cloud;
• Music from your chats and device in a single section;
• Improved chats preview by long tap.

ADVANCED INTERFACE
• Multipanel in chats;
• Messages sorting in chats and in the Cloud;
• Side menu customization;
• Customization of context menu of messages;
• Wide posts and hiding the bottom panel in channels;
• Collapsible posts;
• Filters for contacts and group members;
• Camera selection before recording video messages;
• Confirmation of calls, sending GIF and stickers.

CONVENIENT TOOLS
• Multi-forwarding messages with options, including without author, as well as cross accounts;
• Multi-responses in groups;
• Translation of incoming and outgoing messages;
• Taking out text from photos and images descriptions;
• Translation of voice messages up to 1 minute into text;
• Adding reactions and buttons with links to messages;
• Installing an animated sticker or GIF on your video avatar;
• Neurobot assistants offering quick answers in the form of phrases and GIFs;
• Deleting service messages in your groups and channels;
• Shifting to the beginning of the chat;
• Clearing the cache once a day, separately in chats and in the archive;
• iMe settings backup to the Cloud.

FINANCE
• Crypto wallet for Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain accounts for storing, purchasing and transferring cryptocurrencies;
• Large selection of cryptocurrencies and tokens (ETH, USDT, LIME, BNB, BUSD, LINK, WBTC, MATIC, OKB, LIT, etc);
• Transfers to public addresses, by QR-code, by user ID and directly inside chats;
• Switching between ERC20 / BEP20 networks and exchange bridge;
• DeFi and staking programs;
• Simplex integration for safe purchases of cryptocurrencies via bank cards;
• Decentralized exchange via Uniswap and Pancakeswap.

There are many other features in iMe, join us and try it all!

User authorization, transmission and storage of data occurs through servers of the official client.
Confidentiality and security are fully ensured by the official client.

Write to our support team if you have any wishes, questions or complaints.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
General
• Bug fixes and general optimization.

Crypto Wallet
Bitcoin blockchain integration:
• Non-custodial storage of BTC;
• Transfers within the Bitcoin network;
• Support of the main BTC coin;
• If your already have an EVM wallet, then Bitcoin network will be displayed automatically, with the same seed phrase, as on the EVM-compatible networks;
• Bitcoin support in Binance Pay functionality.

• Confirmation of calls, sending GIF and stickers.

CONVENIENT TOOLS
• Multi-forwarding messages with options, including without author, as well as cross accounts;

• Adding reactions and buttons with links to messages;

• Neurobot assistants offering quick answers in the form of phrases and GIFs;
• Deleting service messages in your groups and channels;
• Shifting to the beginning of the chat;
• Clearing the cache once a day, separately in chats and in the archive;
• iMe settings backup to the Cloud.

FINANCE
• Crypto wallet for Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain accounts for storing, purchasing and transferring cryptocurrencies;
• Large selection of cryptocurrencies and tokens (ETH, USDT, LIME, BNB, BUSD, LINK, WBTC, MATIC, OKB, LIT, etc);
• Transfers to public addresses, by QR-code, by user ID and directly inside chats;
• Switching between ERC20 / BEP20 networks and exchange bridge;
• DeFi and staking programs;
• Simplex integration for safe purchases of cryptocurrencies via bank cards;
• Decentralized exchange via Uniswap and Pancakeswap.

• Sending video as video message via long tap on Send button or 3 dots with the ability to edit;
• Bug fixes and other improvements.

Crypto wallet
• The list of networks is now opened in full screen and with the search feature;
• The hint in Staking section was added for claiming tokens from smart contract;
• NEW badge was added for new networks;
• The support of BASE and Ronin networks was added;
• Ability to hide networks in Crypto Wallet Settings > Interface > Blockchains.

title:
iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet
10.13.3

container.value: Boumpoulinas 1-3, Bouboulina Building, Flat/Office 42, Nicosia, 1060, Cyprus

creator: iMe Lab
descriptionHtml:
iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet is a multifunctional client, powered by API Telegram with built-in tools, Artificial Intelligence, Crypto Wallet and Blockchain.

The main development of the messenger is performed by the official client team, creating the most progressive and advanced messenger in the world.

The iMe team improves the functionality of the main client and also develops its own features:

TO WORK WITH CHATS
• Connection of up to 5 accounts;
• Topics and folders for grouping chats;
• Advanced settings for tabs and folders;
• FAB-buttons settings for changing the standard Pencil;
• Automatic chat sorting by type, including the archive;
• Private albums in the Cloud;
• Music from your chats and device in a single section;
• Improved chats preview by long tap.

ADVANCED INTERFACE
• Multipanel in chats;
• Messages sorting in chats and in the Cloud;
• Side menu customization;
• Customization of context menu of messages;
• Wide posts and hiding the bottom panel in channels;
• Collapsible posts;
• Filters for contacts and group members;
• Camera selection before recording video messages;
• Confirmation of calls, sending GIF and stickers.

CONVENIENT TOOLS
• Multi-forwarding messages with options, including without author, as well as cross accounts;
• Multi-responses in groups;
• Translation of incoming and outgoing messages;
• Taking out text from photos and images descriptions;
• Translation of voice messages up to 1 minute into text;
• Adding reactions and buttons with links to messages;
• Installing an animated sticker or GIF on your video avatar;
• Neurobot assistants offering quick answers in the form of phrases and GIFs;
• Deleting service messages in your groups and channels;
• Shifting to the beginning of the chat;
• Clearing the cache once a day, separately in chats and in the archive;
• iMe settings backup to the Cloud.

FINANCE
• Crypto wallet for Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain accounts for storing, purchasing and transferring cryptocurrencies;
• Large selection of cryptocurrencies and tokens (ETH, USDT, LIME, BNB, BUSD, LINK, WBTC, MATIC, OKB, LIT, etc);
• Transfers to public addresses, by QR-code, by user ID and directly inside chats;
• Switching between ERC20 / BEP20 networks and exchange bridge;
• DeFi and staking programs;
• Simplex integration for safe purchases of cryptocurrencies via bank cards;
• Decentralized exchange via Uniswap and Pancakeswap.

There are many other features in iMe, join us and try it all!

User authorization, transmission and storage of data occurs through servers of the official client.
Confidentiality and security are fully ensured by the official client.

Write to our support team if you have any wishes, questions or complaints.

title:
iMe Messenger & Crypto Wallet
10.14.7

container.value: Boumpoulinas 1-3, Bouboulina Building, Flat/Office 42, Nicosia, 1060, Cyprus

creator: iMe Lab
descriptionHtml:
iMe Messenger with Crypto Wallet is a powerful, multifunctional app that combines the convenience of an advanced messaging app with a secure crypto wallet. Built on the Telegram API, iMe Messenger offers enhanced features for both communication and digital asset management, making it a versatile tool for modern users.

Key Features:

Easy Chat Navigation

- Sorting and Enhanced Folders: Auto-sorting allows for convenient distribution across various categories. Additional folder settings make this customizable messaging app even more comfortable to use.
- Topics: Assign topics to groups and categories. Enjoy Telegram's folder format in a new form without limitations.
- Recent Chats: A multifunctional panel of avatars from recently visited conversations for quick access. Pin your favorite ones without Telegram's restrictions.

Data Protection
Your data and messages are already securely protected by Telegram, but iMe Messenger provides an even higher level of security for a truly privacy-focused app.

- Hidden Chats: Hide chats from the main list or Archive into a special hidden section.
- Password Lock: Set a unique password for any chat, Cloud, and Archive.
- Antivirus: Scan files for viruses directly before downloading.

Crypto Wallet
A decentralized multi-network crypto wallet with DeFi tools, fully controlled by the user. Manage your cryptocurrency with ease in this all-in-one app.

- Major Networks, Cryptocurrencies, and NFTs: Support for Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Solana, TRON, TON, Optimism, and other L2 networks. Manage all existing tokens listed on CMC.
- Native DeFi Services Integration: DEX exchange and cross-chain bridge Symbiosis, unique Binance Pay integration, as well as TON services and Fragment. A versatile cryptocurrency exchange tool right in your messaging app.
- Custom DeFi Tools: Send crypto to addresses, QR codes, or directly in chats. Send invoices for quick payments, staking, and Crypto Boxes for coins and tokens.

Useful Tools
Modern and indispensable services for everyday use and comfortable message management.

- Advanced Translator: Translate entire chats or individual messages with an improved UI. Unique outgoing message translation options make this a customizable messaging app.
- Voice to Text: Instant multilingual recognition of voice and video messages into text by an advanced AI system. Perfect for an app with voice chat and video call features.
- Text from Photos: Easily extract text from photos for further use or direct translation.

Personalization
Your chats, your rules! Customize chats for maximum convenience.

- Multipanel: Quick access panel to frequently used chat options: search, jump to the beginning of the chat, recent actions, media, and more.
- Wide Posts: Read posts in your favorite channels in full-screen width for maximum comfort.
- Colored Replies: Disable colored message blocks and account names for better focus while chatting.

Enhanced Messaging Features

- AI Chat: Experience advanced AI chat capabilities for smarter and more efficient communication.
- Custom Themes: Personalize your interface with custom themes and styles.
- Download Manager: Efficiently manage your downloads within the app.
- Stickers and Bots: Enrich your messaging experience with a wide variety of stickers and interactive bots.
- Proxy Support: Connect securely and privately with built-in proxy support.
- Self-Destructing Messages: Send messages that automatically delete for added privacy.
- Two-Factor Authentication: Enhance security with two-factor authentication.
- Cloud Storage: Securely store and access your messages and files in the cloud.

Join millions of users worldwide and enjoy modern communication and financial capabilities with iMe Messenger!

Write to our support team if you have any wishes, questions or complaints.

Technical support: https://t.me/iMeMessenger
Discussion group: https://t.me/iMe_ai
LIME group: https://t.me/iMeLime
News channel: https://t.me/ime_en
descriptionShort: The ultimate Telegram API messenger with crypto wallet and AI chat! Get it now!

11.7.5

container.value: Boumpoulinas 1-3, Bouboulina Building, Flat/Office 42, Nicosia, 1060, Cyprus

creator: iMe Lab
descriptionHtml:
iMe Messenger with Crypto Wallet is a powerful, multifunctional app that combines the convenience of an advanced messaging app with a secure crypto wallet. Built on the Telegram API, iMe Messenger offers enhanced features for both communication and digital asset management, making it a versatile tool for modern users.

Key Features:

Easy Chat Navigation

- Sorting and Enhanced Folders: Auto-sorting allows for convenient distribution across various categories. Additional folder settings make this customizable messaging app even more comfortable to use.
- Topics: Assign topics to groups and categories. Enjoy Telegram's folder format in a new form without limitations.
- Recent Chats: A multifunctional panel of avatars from recently visited conversations for quick access. Pin your favorite ones without Telegram's restrictions.

Data Protection
Your data and messages are already securely protected by Telegram, but iMe Messenger provides an even higher level of security for a truly privacy-focused app.

- Hidden Chats: Hide chats from the main list or Archive into a special hidden section.
- Password Lock: Set a unique password for any chat, Cloud, and Archive.
- Antivirus: Scan files for viruses directly before downloading.

Crypto Wallet
A decentralized multi-network crypto wallet with DeFi tools, fully controlled by the user. Manage your cryptocurrency with ease in this all-in-one app.

- Major Networks, Cryptocurrencies, and NFTs: Support for Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Solana, TRON, TON, Optimism, and other L2 networks. Manage all existing tokens listed on CMC.
- Native DeFi Services Integration: DEX exchange and cross-chain bridge Symbiosis, unique Binance Pay integration, as well as TON services and Fragment. A versatile cryptocurrency exchange tool right in your messaging app.
- Custom DeFi Tools: Send crypto to addresses, QR codes, or directly in chats. Send invoices for quick payments, staking, and Crypto Boxes for coins and tokens.

Useful Tools
Modern and indispensable services for everyday use and comfortable message management.

- Advanced Translator: Translate entire chats or individual messages with an improved UI. Unique outgoing message translation options make this a customizable messaging app.
- Voice to Text: Instant multilingual recognition of voice and video messages into text by an advanced AI system. Perfect for an app with voice chat and video call features.
- Text from Photos: Easily extract text from photos for further use or direct translation.

Personalization
Your chats, your rules! Customize chats for maximum convenience.

- Multipanel: Quick access panel to frequently used chat options: search, jump to the beginning of the chat, recent actions, media, and more.
- Wide Posts: Read posts in your favorite channels in full-screen width for maximum comfort.
- Colored Replies: Disable colored message blocks and account names for better focus while chatting.

Enhanced Messaging Features

- AI Chat: Experience advanced AI chat capabilities for smarter and more efficient communication.
- Custom Themes: Personalize your interface with custom themes and styles.
- Download Manager: Efficiently manage your downloads within the app.
- Stickers and Bots: Enrich your messaging experience with a wide variety of stickers and interactive bots.
- Proxy Support: Connect securely and privately with built-in proxy support.
- Self-Destructing Messages: Send messages that automatically delete for added privacy.
- Two-Factor Authentication: Enhance security with two-factor authentication.
- Cloud Storage: Securely store and access your messages and files in the cloud.

Join millions of users worldwide and enjoy modern communication and financial capabilities with iMe Messenger!

Write to our support team if you have any wishes, questions or complaints.

descriptionHtml:
iMe Messenger based on the Telegram API — a free chat app with enhanced Telegram features and a built-in AI assistant that makes your communication faster, more convenient, and smarter.

Communicate, create, listen, and protect your data – all in one messenger!

Key Features:

🤖 AI Assistant — an intelligent helper powered by ChatGPT, Gemini, Deepseek, Grok, Claude, and other models:

‧ Summarizes long or unread messages — save time and get the key points instantly.
‧ Answers questions directly in chats — no need to switch apps, the AI offers ideas or ready-made replies.
‧ Converts text to voice — listen to long texts instead of reading them.
‧ Creates and edits images in various styles — from quick sketches to detailed illustrations.
‧ Flexible AI roles and model selection — tailor the assistant to your tasks and communication style.

💬 Full Telegram experience with enhancements:

‧ Auto-sorting of chats, advanced folders, and topics.
‧ Fast navigation through recent conversations.
‧ Improved search and interface.

🛡 Privacy and Security:

‧ Hidden and password-protected chats.
‧ Built-in antivirus scanning for files in chats.
‧ Local security features that enhance Telegram’s protection.

🛠 Useful Tools:

‧ AI-powered translation of messages and chats.
‧ Speech-to-text transcription.
‧ Text recognition from images (OCR).

📱 Full Personalization:

‧ Quick actions and multi-panel layout.
‧ Convenient task lists.
‧ Customizable interface (themes, reply colors, wide post view).

Download iMe for free and try the AI assistant directly in the messenger!
Dive into smart communication with features that truly work. Perfect for personal or anonymous chatting, work, creativity, and productivity.
